name: N.E.O - Near Earth Objects
description:
NEOs, or 'near earth objects' are an emergent threat to all life on this planet. Blast off into space and destroy them all to preserve life as we know it back on Earth!

Nu-retro arcade style shooting designed to challenge and enthrall; this is your game on drugs. Shoot rocks, get POW. Survive.

Featuring a '90 Euro/rave-inspired soundtrack, over 120 waves of sadistic space shootables and an eyeball-tickling aesthetic, this is going to knock your socks off - hope you bought a spare pair.

Controls

To control N.E.O - Near Earth Objects, simply choose your input device; XBox 360 controller, mouse or touchscreen are supported -- and if you want to kick it oldschool with your computer's keyboard, remap the controls how you want them.

If you're using a mouse or a touchscreen, click/touch a part of the screen to make the ship fire at that location. Keep your finger down to thrust toward that area; but don't go too fast!

Keyboard and controller users will find a classic-styled turn left/right and thrust scheme.

Additional controls

In-game, use PAUSE to pause/unpause the game. ESCAPE key will ask if you'd like to quit the game: press 'Y' to confirm and any other key to cancel.
